forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Lows overnight in the mid 40s.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
